attributes.action: stop the hype and blatant prpaganda about climate change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The climate changes. This is a natural phenomenon. Be grateful it is not getting colder.

At least eighty per cent of CO2 emissions are NOT caused by road and air transport. Stop directing 100% of the propaganda at less than 20% of the alleged "cause".

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
